item.title: Model 2: A Chikungunya Model
item.description: A majority of my work so far has been in respitatory viruses and HIV, so developing models for vector-borne viruses is a fun challenge for me. Here, we have my take on a Chikungunya (CHIKV) model developed by Yakob & Clements for the 2006 RÃ©union Island outbreak. I try a couple of different versions of the model to try to replicate the results here. This post is a short example of the process that goes into model development.
